mapper.select: SELECT D.product_id, D.product_name, D.product_price, i3.product_img_renamed FROM product D left join ( select product_id, product_img_renamed from ( select min(i.product_img_no) img_id from product p left join product_image i on p.product_id = i.product_id group by i.product_id ) GI join product_image i2 on GI.img_id = i2.product_img_no ) i3 on D.product_id = i3.product_id
